articles.author: Victoria Kennedy
articles.title: Sony overturns Helldivers 2 PSN requirement following backlash - Eurogamer.net
articles.description: Sony has backtracked on its plans to enforce mandatory PSN linking for Helldivers 2 players on Steam, following backlash.
articles.content:
Following backlash from its community, Sony has overturned plans to enforce mandatory PSN linking for Helldivers 2 players on Steam.
On Friday, the publisher announced Helldivers 2 players on Steam … [+2636 chars]

articles.title: Scientists made chilling discovery after finally reaching the bottom of the Red Sea - LADbible
articles.description: It was a chilling discovery made by the scientists who reached the bottom of the Red Sea, and do you really want to know what they found?
articles.content:
Scientists studying the the Red Sea made a chilling discovery when they finally reached the bottom.
Located between Africa and the Arabian Peninsula, because why else would Moses need to cross it to… [+2659 chars]

articles.title: ‘I have a 50:50 chance of developing Alzheimer’s Disease in my 50s’ - BBC.com
articles.description: John Jennings may have inherited a gene from his mother that could trigger early-onset of the condition.
